description: This file defines a Java class 'DeviceJoinedEvent' that extends an 'Event' class. It models an event indicating a device has joined, identified by its EUI-64 identifier. The class includes a constructor to initialize the event with the device's EUI-64 and a getter method to retrieve this identifier.

classes.name: DeviceJoinedEvent
classes.description: Represents a device-joined event with an EUI-64 identifier, extending the Event class.

methods.name: DeviceJoinedEvent
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the event with the specified EUI-64 identifier.

methods.name: getEui64
methods.description: Returns the EUI-64 identifier associated with the device.
